channel.title: How do you get monsters and stuff on your server and let other people come on?
channel.description:
:confused: Question: (a)How do you get monsters and stuff on you server (b) and let other people come on it? I've tried so many things but it doesn't work.
Another thing is I can't stay on the server I always get kicked off.
Does anybody know how to do any of these? :confused:
Diff. Rating: 6-8
Thank you, this is a really cool version.

item.title: How do you get monsters and stuff on your server and let other people come on?
item.dc:creator: @z4mor4k_m1n1on z4mor4k m1n1on
item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

ok answer for (a) go to autospawn and then copy the first line and it shd be like

spawn = 1699	2816	3462	0	2817	3463	2815	3461	2	Ghost Shopkeeper

ok 1699 is the monster ID 2816 and 3462 are its co-ords 0 is its height and then the next 4 numbers are whre it walks like it will walk up 1 to 2817 then over one to 3463 and 2 is how it walks and then its name,

(b) u can download hamachi and make a network and people can join by ur ip located at the top of the window of hamachi or u can go to no-ip.com and they can enter by ur no-ip address

Read full topic
